balloonsTowerDefence

Class Balloon

  • java.lang.Object
    • balloonsTowerDefence.Balloon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BalloonBlue, BalloonRed

    public class Balloon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BalloonType type 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Balloon(int floorX, int floorY, FloorGrid grid, BalloonType type)
      constructor a balloon object is created with the following as parameters int floorX, int floorY, FloorGrid grid, BalloonType type the balloon is spawned on the floorX and floorY coordinates and the default values provided by the type specified
      Balloon(org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture instanceTexture, Floor startingFloorObject, FloorGrid grid, int width, int height, float speed, float health)
      constructor a balloon object is created with the following as parameters Texture instanceTexture, Floor startingFloorObject, FloorGrid grid, int width, int height, float speed, float health the balloon is created with a texture and spawned on the startingFloorObject with a width and height and speed and health

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void damage(int amount)
      damages the balloon object and requires a damage parameter to subtract from the health if the health is 0 or less then added the specified amount of money to the player object
      void draw()
      Draws the object on the screen represented by the texture on the screen using a static method from DrawInFrame

      int[] getDirections()

      boolean isFirst() 
      void kill()
      sets alive to false so that the balloon is considered dead and is removed from the round
      void reduceHiddenHealth(float amount)
      reduces the health of the balloon and requires a amount to do by so.
